experience: A Closer Look Into Our Office Division
Fantastic day at TEDx on Friday! Many great speakers who spoke about reflection and change. If you’re looking to make a change in your #CareerLife consider AccruePartners.

AccruePartners is one of Charlotte's most reputable Executive Search and Temporary Staffing firms placing Accounting/Finance, Information Technology, Engineering, Corporate Services, Marketing, and Human Resources professionals both contract and direct hire. We are a market leader serving clients and candidates alike to foster relationships and offering market intelligence and pride ourselves on candidates being clients and clients being candidates and take a high touch approach to the businessFounded in Charlotte, NC by industry powerhouse individuals with a combined 35 years of recruiting & business experience. We exercise this high-touch philosophy with each client & candidate, while maximizing the use of available technology in order to build long-term relationships for today, tomorrow & the future.Nominated as one of the “Best Places to Work” from 2007-2016, to the Inc. 5000 9 years running, and awarded Best in Staffing – Client/Talent in 2013-2016. AccruePartners is one of the fastest-growing privately held companies in the nation and has continued to excel beyond the Charlotte area by advancing its reach into other areas of the Southeastern market as well.

summary: At the forefront of Talent Workforce Solutions, AccruePartners is your source for today’s top talent. Our proven business systems combined with an unwavering commitment elevates our practice to the forefront of the recruiting industry. With predictable precision, we deliver top-tier workforce solutions across the United States meeting the demands of a dynamic business environment for mid-size and large, Fortune 500 companies.At AccruePartners, we strengthen companies and build careers by bringing talented candidates and leading businesses together. We are a full-service recruiting firm providing solutions in Staffing, Search and Project Solutions in the following specialties in a national platform currently operating in 38 states:· Accounting and Finance· Information Technology· Engineering· Financial Services· Marketing· Human Resources· Office· VMS/MSP
